cells.data: -- doesFileExist :: FilePath -> IO Boolon doesFileExist(strPath)	set ca to current application	set oPath to (ca's NSString's stringWithString:strPath)'s ¬		stringByStandardizingPath	set {bln, int} to (ca's NSFileManager's defaultManager's ¬		fileExistsAtPath:oPath isDirectory:(reference))	bln and (int ≠ 1)end doesFileExist
